name: overdraw
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to take more money out of your bank account than the account contains: I overdrew my account by £20. If students do overdraw, penalties are less severe than those on standard accounts. See
overdrawn
More examplesFewer examplesThere are no overdraft fees if the amount overdrawn is less than $10.His daughter accidentally overdrew her account.The first time a customer overdraws, there is no overdraft fee.

BANKING to take more money out of a bank account than it contained: overdraw sth by $20/$200 etc. I overdrew my account by £50. Penalties are severe if you do overdraw.overdraw on sth It is not possible for children to overdraw on their accounts.
